divs: sighting detailsi was out in the back yard of my house around 1:30 pm with my camera because i heard a little voice tell me they would reveil themselves to me..! at 12:00 this was after i prayed for the truth to be made known the day before. it was'nt the time of day they where talking about it was 12 o'clock in the sky, stait up thier it was a shinny white orb a very bright light came from the middle of the orb, i began filming and taking pictures as it hoverd and slowly moved spinning and agitating in a horse shoe shaped patern it vanished 10 min. i took 30 or so pics in two days the second day i did not see any orbs in the sky, even with the zoom up to the max. but when i blow the photos up, changing the lighting with another software, i dicoverd they where there! waiting in the sky . i have the pictures to show you. blowning them up i have found 4 crafts in hidding....!above my town ? blow these up and seach you may find another one lrt me know what you find your friend [name removed -cms\dr].
Summary: light orbs found hidding in inner space.
Object Shape: Oval, Sphere, Square, Rectagular, Triangle, Other
